name: tri-attack
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.  One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.

flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
Fires three kinds
of beams at once.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Fires three kinds
of beams at once.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Fires three types of beams
at the same time.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Fires three types of beams
at the same time.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A simultaneous
3-beam attack that
may paralyze, burn,
or freeze the foe.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:

a simultaneous three-
beam attack. May also
paralyze, burn, or
freeze the target.
